page.title: 10THE PARISH COUNCIL.
page.content: THE PARISH COUNCIL IS A GROUP OF PEOPLE ELECTED BY THE VILLAGE EVERY 4 YEARS. THE CHAIRMAN IS MR LITTLE.THE COUNCIL MAKES THE PLACE NICE,TIDY,AND A HAPPIER LIFE.THERE ARE 22 STREETS IN GROVE.THE STAFF ARE MR FALKENAU (THE CLERK), MRS COPP (CLERKS SECRETARY), 2 GRASSCUTTERS AND 2 GARDENERS.THEY GET THEIR MONEY FROM THE RATES.THEY HAVE EQUIPMENT LIKE COMPUTERS,ROPE,ETC.THEY LOOK AFTER GREENS,COMMONS,PARKS,ETC.IF SOMEBODY WANTED TO BUILD A HOUSE THEY HAVE TO TELL THE DISTRICT COUNCIL.THEY DO THE SAME WITH POSTERS BUT CONTACT THE PARISH COUNCIL.THE OFFICE IS NEAR THE INFANTS SCHOOL IN A PORTABLE HUT.THEY GIVE MONEY TO THE BROWNIES.THEY DO TYPING AND PAPERWORK. WRITTEN BY DUNCAN.V.
